channel.title: Has anyone thought about re-writing the client?
channel.description: With Google Chromes "Native Client", a fast and cross-platform true web client would be an awesome project. Has anyone fiddled around with writing their own client?

item.title: Has anyone thought about re-writing the client?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

HTML5 would probably be a better, more cross-platform way to re-write it. But it certainly isn’t a trivial task.

Read full topic
item.source: Has anyone thought about re-writing the client?
